name: Registry

commentData.description:
Class representing an Abstract Registry.

** Applications should retrieve instances from {@link BusinessNetworkConnection}**

tags.title: memberof
tags.description: module:composer-client

methods.name: addAll

tags.title: param
tags.description: The resources to be added to the registry.
tags.name: resources

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved when the resource is
added to the registry.

description: Adds a list of new resources to the registry.

parameters.description: The resources to be added to the registry.
parameters.name: resources

description: A promise that will be resolved when the resource is added to the registry.

methods.name: removeAll

commentData.description: Removes a list of resources from the registry.

tags.description: The resources, or the unique identifiers of the resources.
tags.name: resources

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved when the resource is
added to the registry.

methods.name: remove

commentData.description: Remove an asset with a given type and id from the registry.

tags.description: The resource, or the unique identifier of the resource.
tags.name: resource

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved when the resource is
removed from the registry.

parameters.description: The resource, or the unique identifier of the resource.
parameters.name: resource

description: A promise that will be resolved when the resource is removed from the registry.

methods.name: getAll

commentData.description: Get all of the resources in the registry.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved with an array of JSON
objects representing the resources.

description: Get all of the resources in the registry.
A promise that will be resolved with an array of JSON objects representing the resources.

methods.summary: Get all of the resources in the registry

tags.description: The unique identifier of the resource.
tags.name: id

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved with a JSON object
representing the resource.

methods.name: exists

commentData.description: Determines whether a specific resource exists in the registry.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The unique identifier of the resource.
tags.name: id

tags.title: return
tags.description: A promise that will be resolved with true/false depending on whether the resource exists.

description: Determines whether a specific resource exists in the registry.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource.
parameters.name: id

description: A promise that will be resolved with true/false depending on whether the resource exists.

methods.summary: Determines whether a specific resource exists in the registry

methods.name: resolveAll

commentData.description:
Get all of the resources in the registry, and resolve all of their relationships
to other assets, participants, and transactions. The result is a JavaScript
object, and should only be used for visualization purposes. You cannot use
the {@link #add add} or {@link #update update} functions with a resolved resource.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved with an array of JavaScript
objects representing the resources and all of their resolved relationships.

description: Get all of the resources in the registry, and resolve all of their relationships to other assets, participants, and transactions. The result is a JavaScript object, and should only be used for visualization purposes. You cannot use the {@link #add add} or {@link #update update} functions with a resolved resource.
A promise that will be resolved with an array of JavaScript objects representing the resources and all of their resolved relationships.

methods.summary: Get all of the resources in the registry, and resolve all of their relationships to other assets, participants, and transactions

methods.name: resolve

commentData.description:
Get a specific resource in the registry, and resolve all of its relationships
to other assets, participants, and transactions. The result is a JavaScript
object, and should only be used for visualization purposes. You cannot use
the  {@link #add add} or {@link #update update} functions with a resolved resource.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The unique identifier of the asset.
tags.name: id

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved with a JavaScript object
representing the resource and all of its resolved relationships.

description: Get a specific resource in the registry, and resolve all of its relationships to other assets, participants, and transactions. The result is a JavaScript object, and should only be used for visualization purposes. You cannot use the  {@link #add add} or {@link #update update} functions with a resolved resource.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the asset.
parameters.name: id

description: A promise that will be resolved with a JavaScript object representing the resource and all of its resolved relationships.

methods.summary: Get a specific resource in the registry, and resolve all of its relationships to other assets, participants, and transactions

description: Class representing an Abstract Registry.
** Applications should retrieve instances from {@link BusinessNetworkConnection}**
